r.s: An optional accelerator for Automap and PHK
r.d:
An optional accelerator for Automap and PHK.
Automap (http://automap.tekwire.net) is a fast map-based autoloader.
PHK (http://phk.tekwire.net) is a PHP-oriented package/archive system.
This extension does not provide any new feature, it just provides a dramatic increase in performance when using Automap and/or PHK.
Note that there is no 'Automap' PECL extension anymore. The PHK extension now includes it. So, this is the one you need, even if using Automap out of PHK packages.
